Tails pressed a button that made the wall open and showed Amy, blaze, rouge, vanilla, and cream. Tails said all he had to do is take a body part and move it. He showed sonic the girls brains in jars and told him the four sect
ions. He also showed sonic homemade prices that acted like your in love with someone, is your daughter, etc.What does sonic do?
1.title: the beginning

12.content: When tails wasn't looking sonic opened his head and took out his brain. He to Amy's fangirl personality and swapped it with his. Then he changed his name to cream. He then took cream's fur color and pasted it on him. He took blaze's chest and put it on tails. He then added Amy's vagina, blaze's ears and tail. He the copied rouge's figure and put it on tailed making him/her 19. He was about to put the brain in then he thought, " should I change myself or just stay the same?"
12.title: take tails' brain out and change him

14.content: Which body should he put it in?
14.title: put his brain in another body

choices: "Tails, where am I? Have you seen Sonic?" (Shit.)
142.content:
This was all too much for Sonic to take in at once. He had no idea that Tails has such a sadistic side to him, that he would be so willing to experiment on their friends like this. Still, though. The thought of being able to experience life from a different point of view was far too great of an opportunity for him to let simply pass by. "Put me in Amy." He told his mad scientist for a friend. Sonic spends so much time running from her, maybe he could learn a thing or two from being her, even for just a little while. He could learn a lesson about life or something, like those producers at SEGA keep hammering over the head.

"If you say so..." Tails injected Sonic with a needle and in what felt like seconds, in reality, hours, he awoke in the body of Amy Rose on an operating table. She was still fully clothed in her red and white dress, matching boots, gloves, wrist rings, white cotton panties, and bra. The sudden change in the center of gravity, though Amy isn't too busty, she's still average enough to cause unbalance for inexperienced Sonic. "These look way bigger from here." Sonic spoke in Amy's high pitched tone, covering his mouth with Amy's hands, a light film of blush rising on her cheeks.

"Perfect!" Tails exclaimed, lifting his goggles off of his eyes and taking off his labcoat. "How do you feel, Miss Rose?" The twin-tailed fox boy teased.
142.title: Sonic Rose

info.brief_description: Sonic is able to swap body parts of the girls
info.description:
The brain has 4 part.

Top left: personality

Top right: name

Bottom left: marriage, loves, and so forth

Bottom right: mannerisms

Rules:
1. Sonic change the body and parts if the brain

2. No cosmos, tikal, and marine

3. No killing off characters

4. Sonic change other people as well

5. Whenever a part is swapped reality changes

6. No OCs

7. The parts that can be swapped are* hair, ears, tail, chests, crotches, mouths, and eyes.

8. Parts that can be copied* size/ figure, and fur color
